replies.author: 樱千落妖精
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: DreamVoid
replies.txt_content:
无法读取Java目录的配置文件
我只能建议你：卸载你原来的Java软件，重新启动电脑，安装这个安装包
download.mcbbs.net/java/jre_x64.exe

replies.author: Mr_Meng
replies.txt_content:
run server应该是一个.bat吧？
右键点编辑，把具体内容发上来
